title: Overlord: Oukoku no Kan-tachi - Drama CD-tsuki Tokusou-ban
content:
Tea break, tea break, everybody come and take a sip! The Pleiades are back for another drama-filled trip, where they spill the tea about their latest missions and commitment to their one and only king, Ainz Ooal Gown! But hold up, this time it's not just on the big screen, it's on CD, so you can enjoy it while sipping on some green tea! So, let's get ready to join in on this picture-perfect tea party with the Overlord: Oukoku no Kan-tachi - Drama CD-tsuki Tokusou-ban edition

Steeping into the sweet and savory world of Overlord, the Pleiades gather for a well-deserved tea break! And whowouldn't want to take a sip of this delightful audio drama? With its calming brew of character moments and witty banter, this picture drama is a steaming cup of hot entertainment!

So why not take a sip and join the girls for some chitchat? Whether you're a fan or just looking for a pick-me-up, "Overlord: Oukoku no Kan-tachi - Drama CD-tsuki Tokusou-ban" is the perfect blend for you!

I'm just kidding, nothing to see here but the great still art.
